data.comment: The match is underway at Banc of California Stadium.
Ramy Touchan awards Houston a goal kick.
In the minute 3, Houston's Mauro Manotas gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Goal kick for Los Angeles at Banc of California Stadium.
Ball safe as Los Angeles is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 8, Throw-in for Los Angeles in the half of Houston.
Goal! The home team take a 1-0 lead through Diego Rossi.
Mohammed El Munir with an assist there.
In the minute 11, Los Angeles to take a throw-in in Houston territory.
Houston have been awarded a corner by Ramy Touchan.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 15, Free kick Los Angeles.
Corner awarded to Los Angeles.
Ramy Touchan signals a Los Angeles throw-in in Houston's half.
In the minute 19, Can Los Angeles get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Houston's half?
Free kick for Houston in the half of Los Angeles.
Danny Musovski for Los Angeles drives towards goal at Banc of California Stadium. But the finish is unsuccessful.
In the minute 22, Corner awarded to Los Angeles.
Goal! Eddie Segura extends Los Angeles's lead to 2-0.
Jesus Murillo instrumental with a fine assist.
In the minute 24, Ramy Touchan signals a free kick to Los Angeles in their own half.
In Los Angeles a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Los Angeles have been awarded a corner by Ramy Touchan.
In the minute 27, Throw-in for Houston at Banc of California Stadium.
Can Houston get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Los Angeles's half?
Houston awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 29, Ramy Touchan signals a Los Angeles throw-in in Houston's half.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 32, An attacking Houston player has been brought down in the area ... It's a penalty!
Eddie Segura (Los Angeles) has received a yellow card from Ramy Touchan.
Mauro Manotas (Houston) had a chance from the penalty spot but missed!
In the minute 33, Ramy Touchan signals a free kick to Houston.
Houston's Matias Vera has been booked in Los Angeles.
Free kick for Los Angeles in their own half.
Houston to take a throw-in in Los Angeles territory.
In the minute 37, Free kick Los Angeles.
In Los Angeles Los Angeles attack through Diego Rossi. The finish is off target, however.
Ball goes out of play for a Houston goal kick.
In the minute 39, Throw-in Los Angeles.
Los Angeles are in shooting range from this free kick.
Los Angeles's Eduard Atuesta breaks free at Banc of California Stadium. But the strike goes wide of the post.
In the minute 41, Houston have a goal kick.
Throw-in for Los Angeles in their own half.
Los Angeles awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 43, Free kick for Los Angeles in the half of Houston.
Brian Rodriguez gets his shot on target but fails to score for Los Angeles.
Los Angeles have been awarded a corner by Ramy Touchan.
In the minute 45, Ramy Touchan awards the home team a throw-in.
1 minutes will be added to the 1st half.
Throw-in for Los Angeles in their own half.
In the minute 45, In Los Angeles, Los Angeles push forward quickly but are pulled up for offside.
4 minutes of injury time will be added to the 1st half.
Los Angeles pushes forward through Mohammed El Munir, whose finish on goal is saved.
In the minute 45, Ramy Touchan signals a free kick to Los Angeles.
The first half has been concluded at Banc of California Stadium.
The second-half is underway in Los Angeles.
In the minute 46, The home team have replaced Danny Musovski with Bradley Wright-Phillips. This is the first substitution made today by Bob Bradley.
Goal! Ariel Lassiter pulls one back for Houston to make it 2-1.
Great play from Darwin Quintero to set up the goal.
In the minute 46, Houston make their first substitution with Ariel Lassiter replacing Memo Rodriguez.
Throw-in Houston.
Ramy Touchan signals a free kick to Houston in their own half.
In the minute 49, Throw-in for Houston in the half of Los Angeles.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Los Angeles.
Can Houston get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Los Angeles's half?
In the minute 51, Mauro Manotas for Houston gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Ramy Touchan awards Los Angeles a goal kick.
Ball safe as Los Angeles is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 54, Los Angeles's Diego Rossi is whistled for offside at Banc of California Stadium.
Los Angeles awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Free kick for Houston in their own half.
In the minute 56, Jose Cifuentes (Los Angeles) fires in a shot – and hits the post!
Ball goes out of play for a Houston goal kick.
Corner awarded to Houston.
In the minute 58, Houston have been awarded a corner by Ramy Touchan.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Los Angeles.
In Los Angeles a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 59, Matias Vera has been booked for the second time in this match - the red card is coming out!
The home team replace Brian Rodriguez with Carlos Vela.
Corner awarded to Los Angeles.
Tristan Blackmon is replacing Eddie Segura for the home team.
In the minute 61, Latif Blessing is on a sub for Francisco Ginella for Los Angeles.
Free kick Los Angeles.
In the minute 62, Los Angeles have been awarded a corner by Ramy Touchan.
The away team replace Mauro Manotas with Boniek Garcia.
Ramy Touchan awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 65, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Corner awarded to Los Angeles.
Tristan Blackmon (Los Angeles) gets up for a header but cannot keep the ball on target.
In the minute 66, Goal kick for Houston at Banc of California Stadium.
Throw-in for Houston at Banc of California Stadium.
Ramy Touchan signals a Houston throw-in in Los Angeles's half.
In the minute 69, Throw-in Los Angeles.
Tab Ramos (Houston) is making a third substitution, with Nico Lemoine replacing Niko Hansen.
Corner awarded to Los Angeles.
In the minute 71, Bradley Wright-Phillips's header is off-target for Los Angeles.
Houston have a goal kick.
Free kick for Los Angeles in the half of Houston.
In the minute 72, Darwin Quintero (Houston) gets a yellow card.
Carlos Vela of Los Angeles gets in a strike, but is off target.
Houston have a goal kick.
In the minute 74, Los Angeles's Mohammed El Munir is on target but unsuccessful.
Los Angeles are pushing forward but Diego Rossi's finish is wide of the goal.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Los Angeles.
In the minute 77, Houston to take a throw-in in Los Angeles territory.
Ramy Touchan awards the home team a throw-in.
Throw-in for Los Angeles in the half of Houston.
In the minute 78, Goal kick for Houston at Banc of California Stadium.
Houston awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Los Angeles to take a throw-in in Houston territory.
In the minute 80, Ball safe as Los Angeles is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Houston needs to be cautious. Los Angeles have an attacking throw-in.
Ramy Touchan signals a free kick to Houston.
In the minute 83, Los Angeles drives forward and Carlos Vela gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Can Los Angeles capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Houston's half?
Los Angeles advance rapidly upfield but Ramy Touchan blows for offside.
In the minute 84, Los Angeles's Carlos Vela misses with an attempt on goal.
Ramy Touchan awards Houston a goal kick.
In Los Angeles a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 84, Jose Cifuentes (Los Angeles) has received a first yellow card.
Latif Blessing (Los Angeles) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Los Angeles awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 89, Houston push upfield but Ramy Touchan quickly pulls them for offside.
4 minutes will be added to the 2nd half in Los Angeles.
Los Angeles have been awarded a corner by Ramy Touchan.
Throw-in for Los Angeles in the half of Houston.
Ramy Touchan signals a free kick to Los Angeles in their own half.
At Banc of California Stadium, Houston are penalized for being offside.
Ball goes out of play for a Houston goal kick.
Ball goes out of play for a Los Angeles goal kick.
The second-half is over. The match ends 2-1.
At Banc of California Stadium, Boniek Garcia has been yellow-carded for the away team.
